app.title: Optimal Build Studio
app.tagline: Accelerate compliance and design coordination across your CAD workflows.

feasibility.description: Kick off planning studies with project context, rule packs and buildability checks.

finance.description: Explore finance scenarios with escalated cost, NPV and IRR metrics.

uploader.title: Upload building layouts
uploader.subtitle: Drop DXF/IFC/JSON, vector PDF/SVG, or JPEG floorplans to launch the parse pipeline and monitor overlays in real-time.
uploader.dropHint: Drag & drop or paste DXF, IFC, JSON, PDF, SVG, or JPEG files here
uploader.error: Something went wrong while parsing the CAD file.

detection.title: Floor and unit detection preview
detection.subtitle: Review detected spaces, approve batches and understand overlay impact.
detection.pendingNotice: {{count}} pending overlays — resolve to enable export.
detection.pendingNoticeSingle: 1 pending overlay — resolve to enable export.
detection.pendingTooltip: Pending overlays must be resolved by providing data or recording a decision before export becomes available.

severitySummary.heading: Overlay severity
severitySummary.infoOnly: Only informational overlays are visible. Toggle severity filters to review pending requirements.
severitySummary.hiddenPendingTooltip: Reset severity filters to show all pending overlays
severitySummary.helperAllVisible: All severities visible. Use these filters to triage urgent issues first.

detection.layerHint: {{statuses}} overlays are hidden by default. Toggle them on to review prior decisions.
detection.empty: No units match the current filters.
detection.locked: Zone is locked. Unlock to update review status.
detection.exportFallback: PDF export requires the optional ReportLab component. Download DXF/IFC instead or install ReportLab.

pipelines.title: Default pipeline suggestions
pipelines.subtitle: Leverage rule packs tailored to the detected overlays and topics.

finance.title: Finance feasibility
finance.subtitle: Compare escalated cost, NPV, IRR and DSCR metrics across seeded scenarios.

agentsCapture.title: Universal GPS site capture
agentsCapture.subtitle: Log a Singapore site, fetch zoning context and review quick multi-scenario insights before inviting the wider team.

form.helper: Coordinates default to the Singapore CBD. Adjust them or paste precise GPS points from the field.

errors.coordinatesInvalid: Enter valid latitude and longitude values to continue.
errors.generic: Unable to generate the quick analysis. Please try again.

rawLand.title: Raw land potential
rawLand.description: Estimate GFA capacity and permitted use mix from the URA zoning profile.

existingBuilding.title: Existing building uplift
existingBuilding.description: Compare approved GFA with zoning headroom to spot retrofit or extension opportunities.

heritageProperty.title: Heritage sensitivity
heritageProperty.description: Flag assets that may require conservation workflows or STB engagement.

underusedAsset.title: Underused asset review
underusedAsset.description: Blend amenity data with current use to highlight repositioning ideas.

results.title: Quick analysis
results.subtitle: Review the highlights before handing off to developers, architects or compliance teams.
results.empty: No analysis insights were generated for the selected scenarios.

agentsCapture.disclaimer: Illustrative analysis only. Always confirm results with the core development, compliance and finance teams before distributing externally.
agentsCapture.placeholder: Capture a set of coordinates to unlock quick scenario insights for agents and advisors.

context.mapFallback: Add VITE_MAPBOX_ACCESS_TOKEN to view the interactive map.

disclaimers.preDevelopment: Illustrative marketing feasibility analysis — validate assumptions with development, compliance and finance teams before external use.
disclaimers.salesLeasing: Indicative layout and specifications — dimensions approximate, subject to final contract documentation and authority approvals.
disclaimers.default: Illustrative analysis only. Always confirm results with the core development, compliance and finance teams before distributing externally.

panels.rulePackEmpty: Rules will appear after the first overlays are processed.
panels.exportSubtitle: Deliver CAD overlays and compliance notes in preferred formats.

wizard.title: Feasibility assessment
wizard.description: Screen an address against zoning overlays, calculate buildable capacity and surface the clauses that drive the result.

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.

assumptions.title: Assumptions
assumptions.subtitle: Tweak the inputs the engine uses to derive height limits and net saleable area.

errors.required: Enter a value to update the estimate.
errors.invalid: Enter a number greater than zero.

states.idle: Enter a seeded address to load the zoning profile.
states.empty: We could not match this address to a seeded parcel yet.
states.partial: Zone resolved but no published rules are tagged to this parcel.

accessibility.noZone: No zone resolved for this address.
accessibility.updated: Feasibility updated for zone {{zone}} with {{overlays}} overlays.
